message: Rule applicable: div_to_bubble ([("Bubble", 6000)]), to expression: UnsafeDiv(a, b), resulting in: {SafeDiv(a, b) @ (b != 0)}
Rule applicable: bubble_up ([("Bubble", 8900)]), to expression: ({SafeDiv(a, b) @ (b != 0)} = 1), resulting in: {(SafeDiv(a, b) = 1) @ And([(b != 0)])}
Rule applicable: expand_bubble ([("Bubble", 8900)]), to expression: {(SafeDiv(a, b) = 1) @ And([(b != 0)])}, resulting in: And([(SafeDiv(a, b) = 1), And([(b != 0)])])
Rule applicable: introduce_diveq ([("Minion", 4200)]), to expression: (SafeDiv(a, b) = 1), resulting in: DivEq(a, b, 1)
Rule applicable: remove_unit_vector_and ([("Base", 8800)]), to expression: And([(b != 0)]), resulting in: (b != 0)
